effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.
